name: Through Their Eyes
description:
“Through Their Eyes” aims to illustrate what it is to live with invisible disabilities, and the impacts of society’s microaggression towards them. Traverse the inner mind and gather ‘courage’ to unlock a series of memories and break down the social barriers of neurodivergent invisibility!

In order to pass each level, you must collect all the courage orbs, to be exact, 16! If you step on the button without collecting exactly 16, you must restart the game :(

Beware of red tiles.
